metadata.title: Azure Developer Associate
metadata.subtitle: Build the Future of Software Development
metadata.description: Traditional development is dying. Cloud-native development is the future. This course transforms you from someone who builds applications into someone who builds scalable, resilient systems that millions of users depend on every day.
prerequisites: Experience coding in at least one programming language
A desire to build applications that scale

highlights: Master the cloud development skills that top companies demand
Build applications that automatically scale to millions of users
Learn the architecture patterns that power modern software
Join the elite group of developers who build the cloud

overview.summary: The best developers don't just write code - they build systems that change how people live and work. This course teaches you the Azure development skills that separate the developers who get hired from those who don't. You'll learn to build applications that are secure by default, scale automatically, and integrate seamlessly with the entire Azure ecosystem. By the end, you'll have the technical skills and architectural knowledge to lead development teams and build the next generation of cloud applications.
objectives: Master Azure compute services and serverless architectures
Build secure, scalable applications with Azure storage and databases
Implement authentication, authorization, and security best practices
Design and implement monitoring and troubleshooting solutions
Create APIs and integrate with third-party services
Deploy and manage applications in production environments
overview.targetAudience: This course is for developers who are ready to level up their skills and become the cloud architects that companies compete for. Whether you're a backend developer looking to add cloud expertise, a full-stack developer wanting to master scalable architectures, or someone ready to transition into cloud-native development - if you want to build applications that power the modern world, this course will give you the skills and mindset to make it happen.

faq.question: What programming languages are covered?
faq.answer: The course covers C#, JavaScript/TypeScript, Python, and Java. You'll learn to use Azure SDKs for these languages.

faq.question: Do I need prior Azure experience?
faq.answer: Yes, AZ-900 (Azure Fundamentals) is a prerequisite. Basic programming experience is also required.

faq.question: What Azure services will I learn?
faq.answer: You'll learn Azure App Service, Functions, Storage, SQL Database, Cosmos DB, Key Vault, API Management, and more.

faq.question: Is this course hands-on?
faq.answer: Yes, this course includes extensive hands-on labs where you'll build real Azure applications and services.
